00019 #include "kstartuplogo.h"
00020 #include <kapplication.h>
00021 #include <kstandarddirs.h>
00022 
00023 KStartupLogo::KStartupLogo(QWidget * parent, const char *name) : QWidget(parent,name, WStyle_NoBorder | WStyle_Customize | WDestructiveClose ), m_bReadyToHide( false ),LogoCloseTimer(NULL),LogoCloseTime(1){
00024         QPixmap pm;
00025         pm.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-logo.jpg");
00026         setBackgroundPixmap(pm);
00027         setGeometry(KApplication::desktop()->width()/2-pm.width()/2, KApplication::desktop()->height()/2-pm.height()/2, pm.width(),pm.height());
00028         
00029         //DAVID Timer Set up
00030         LogoCloseTimer=new QTimer(this);
00031         //DAVID Connect LogoCloseTimer to slot "slotCloseLogo"
00032         connect(LogoCloseTimer,SIGNAL(timeout()),this,SLOT(slotCloseLogo()));
00033         LogoCloseTimer->start( LogoCloseTime*1000, TRUE ); // 2 seconds single-shot timer
00034 }
00035 
00036 KStartupLogo::~KStartupLogo()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 void KStartupLogo::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent*)
00041 {
00042         if (m_bReadyToHide) hide();
00043 }
00044 
00045 void KStartupLogo::slotCloseLogo()
00046 {
00047    //DAVID Hide Logo itself.
00048    this->hide();
00049    emit signalTriggerMainWidget();
00050 }
